scripts.setup: npm install | npm run clone-bootstrap && npm run init-custom
scripts.clone-bootstrap: rm -rf tmp/bootstrap && git clone --quiet https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap tmp/bootstrap
scripts.init-custom: touch tmp/bootstrap/scss/_custom.scss && grep -q -F '@import "custom";' tmp/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap.scss || echo '@import "custom";' >> tmp/bootstrap/scss/bootstrap.scss
